modName: Erecde Cours Laszoula - The Banished Goddess
summary: Laszoula is banished from her native land because of her ability to summon a god like soul in battles.  Laszoula is available in UUNP HDT & NonHDT as well as individual followers.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/nssa7k4uf/LaszoulaTitle.png[/img]
[font=Verdana]Permission granted for follower creation based on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/24677469/?tb=feed&pUp=1]Erecde Cours[/url] preset.

To hear "Luna" please click on the image below.

[url=https://soundcloud.com/mythocs/mythocs-luna][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/c0p95er9j/luna.png[/img][/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/r0wrklr47/blur.jpg[/img]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/6pclm15dz/Story.png[/img]
[/font][font=Verdana][size=2]There was once a precious land in the skies...

The most (sweet) PRECIOUS land in the skies...

It was called the land of the gods...
although there were only 3 gods living in it

The land was reign by these 3 gods and they reigned it good...
(actually only 2 of them reigned but more to that later...)

Now there was one god... the highest guardian of this land.
His name got never taught to anyone, because nobody may call his name...

The second one wasn't a person like you would imagine.
It was a invisible soul of the first god that ever lived.

But it was to weak to live by itself so it needed another soul to combine with and to live in the body this other soul was living in...

And there person that got chosen by this soul was called...

Laszoula. (engl. for last soul (not english))

She was the daughter of the highest guardian.
But two souls don't have enough space in one body so the first god's soul 
had to take his place in the skin of Laszoula...

But once upon a time, she let an old man into the lands of the gods...

This man looked just like a normal person, so she didn't doubt it.

But then,
the man vanished into the air, got to the highest of all stars that were holding the cell of the land of the gods...

In blink all of the soldiers and guardians were up to chase the man down, and they actually caught him in the end, but after they placed the star back onto the cell, it wasn't as powerful as it was before and the guardening cell got mortal to enemies...

The highest guardian had no choice but sending his own daughter into exile on a planet called "Nirn"...

So she was banned from her own lands and was sent onto this planet to survive on her own still holding on to the soul of the first god that ever lived...
[/size][/font][font=Verdana]
The story continues here:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/Images/647356/?]Banned Goddess Part 2[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/tkseepeo7/20170128223105_1.jpg[/img][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/bj99gwknb/20170129013955_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/waotlvslj/Info.png[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/4m26ed5l3/FAQ.png[/img]
[/url]Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  Not without express permission from Erecde Cours

Q:  While you release *insert body type here*
A:  I have no immediate plans to do so.  My apologies.

Q:  I don't want a follower summoning another?
A:  Please feel free to download them individually under Optional Downloads.

Q:  Will you change *insert request here*?
A:  My apologies but this is not my character so I will not make changes to appearance.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.
A:  I will probably refuse any little girl/boy looking follower requests though.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*
